title: MIMIC-IV Clinical Database
abstract: Large ICU dataset with deidentified health records including vitals, labs, medications, and clinical notes.

title: eICU Collaborative Research Database
abstract: Multi-center critical care database from over 200 hospitals with high-resolution vital signs and treatments.

title: PhysioNet ECG Database (MIT-BIH Arrhythmia)
abstract: Classic ECG arrhythmia recordings used for arrhythmia detection research.

title: UK Biobank Imaging and Health Data
abstract: Large-scale population cohort with imaging, genetic, and clinical phenotypes (requires application).

title: ADNI (Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative)
abstract: Longitudinal imaging and biomarker data for Alzheimer's disease research.

title: OpenNeuro
abstract: Open repository for human neuroimaging datasets in BIDS format.

title: NIH Chest X-ray Dataset (ChestX-ray14)
abstract: Large chest X-ray dataset with multiple thoracic disease labels.

title: CheXpert Chest Radiograph Dataset
abstract: Large labeled chest radiograph dataset for detection of pathologies.

title: RSNA Pneumonia Detection Challenge (Kaggle)
abstract: Labeled CXR dataset with bounding box annotations for pneumonia.

title: LIDC-IDRI (Lung CT)
abstract: Lung CT scans annotated by radiologists for nodule detection.

title: LUNA16 (Lung Nodule Analysis)
abstract: Subset/benchmark for lung nodule detection from LIDC.

title: gnomAD
abstract: Aggregated exome and genome sequencing data for allele frequencies.

title: ClinVar
abstract: Public archive of relationships between genetic variants and phenotypes.

title: DrugBank
abstract: Comprehensive drug and drug target information.

title: ChEMBL
abstract: Bioactivity database of drug-like molecules.

title: SIDER (Side Effect Resource)
abstract: Information on marketed medicines and their recorded adverse drug reactions.

title: OpenFDA
abstract: APIs providing access to FDA datasets (adverse events, recalls, labels).

title: ClinicalTrials.gov Public Data
abstract: Global registry of clinical trials and study metadata.

title: All of Us Research Program
abstract: Large US cohort with health records, genomics, and survey data (access controlled).

title: Human Connectome Project (HCP)
abstract: High-quality multi-modal imaging datasets for brain connectivity research.

title: OASIS Brain Imaging Datasets
abstract: MRI datasets for studying aging and dementia.

title: MedMNIST
abstract: Lightweight medical image datasets for quick prototyping.

title: HAM10000 (Skin lesion)
abstract: Dermatoscopic images for skin lesion classification.

title: ISIC Skin Cancer Archive
abstract: Large dermoscopic image repository for skin lesion analysis.

title: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection (Kaggle)
abstract: Fundus images labeled by DR severity.

title: OCT2017 (Kermany)
abstract: OCT images for retinal disease classification.

title: MIMIC-CXR Chest X-ray
abstract: CXR images with reports from MIMIC-critical care patients.

title: PhysioNet Challenge Datasets
abstract: Collection of challenge datasets (ECG, ICU, etc.) from PhysioNet.

title: COVID-19 Radiography Database
abstract: Aggregated CXR images of COVID-19, pneumonia, and normal cases.

title: BIMCV COVID-19 Dataset
abstract: Annotated chest X-rays and CTs from COVID-19 patients.

title: PhysioNet Sepsis Clinical Records
abstract: EHR datasets for sepsis research (various formats).

title: Framingham Heart Study (public datasets)
abstract: Longitudinal community cohort for cardiovascular disease research.

title: PEP (Pediatric Emergency dataset)
abstract: Pediatric emergency visit dataset (placeholder link).

title: NHANES (US National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey)
abstract: Nationally representative health and nutrition surveys with biomarkers.

title: DHS Program (Demographic and Health Surveys)
abstract: Large cross-national survey datasets on population and health.

title: WHO Global Health Observatory (GHO) datasets
abstract: WHO's data portal with thousands of health indicators.

title: GEO Series (Gene Expression Omnibus)
abstract: Repository of gene expression and high-throughput functional genomic data.

title: ArrayExpress
abstract: Functional genomics data repository from EBI.

title: GTEx (Genotype-Tissue Expression)
abstract: Tissue-specific gene expression across many donors.

title: Human Protein Atlas (HPA)
abstract: Molecular data on protein expression across tissues and cells.

title: The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA)
abstract: Open archive of cancer imaging datasets with annotations.

title: PhysioNet MIMIC-Note (Clinical NLP)
abstract: Deidentified clinical notes for NLP research (subset of MIMIC with notes).

title: Beth Israel Deaconess ECG Database
abstract: ECG recordings from BIDMC (example/placeholder).

title: Stroke Imaging Dataset (ISLES)
abstract: Ischemic stroke lesion segmentation datasets used in challenges.

title: Dental X-ray Dataset
abstract: Dataset of dental radiographs (placeholder).

title: Open-i (NIH biomedical image search)
abstract: Searchable index of images from PubMed Central articles.

abstract: Multi-Center Orthopedic Archive comprises deidentified orthopedic data for research purposes; includes images/signals/clinical annotations collected across multiple centers.
